description.compact: CssSelector is the main entry point of the component and can convert CSS selectors to XPath expressions.

docblock.description:
$xpath = CssSelector::toXpath('h1.foo');
This component is a port of the Python cssselect library, which is copyright Ian Bicking, @see https://github.com/SimonSapin/cssselect.

description.compact: Translates a CSS expression to its XPath equivalent.

docblock.description: Optionally, a prefix can be added to the resulting XPath expression with the $prefix parameter.

param.description: An optional prefix for the XPath expression.
